Key Match Events: Jusuf Nurkic made two free throws with 0.8 seconds left in the game, having been fouled on an offensive rebound, securing the win for the Suns.
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas Mavericks head coach Jason Kidd expressed frustration with the team's slow start and lack of energy, emphasizing the need for improvement from the bench.
Others: The game was a close 114-113 loss for the Dallas Mavericks, marking their fourth loss in nine games.
